dcterms:description: Historical stock prices of 180 stocks across 18 sectors listed on the NSE, India, used for predicting future stock prices and analyzing sector profitability.
dcterms:title: Historical stock prices of 180 stocks across 18 sectors listed on the NSE, India

dcterms:description: NSE report on significant stocks in various sectors, used to identify the top stocks contributing to sectoral index calculations.
dcterms:title: NSE report on significant stocks in various sectors

dcterms:description: Stock prices retrieved from Yahoo Finance, used for preprocessing and transformation of raw data for stock price prediction.
dcterms:title: Stock prices retrieved from Yahoo Finance

dcterms:description: Stock market data for various sectors (e.g., Auto, Banking, Consumer Durables, etc.), used for analyzing sector profitability and prediction accuracy.
dcterms:title: Stock market data for various sectors

dcterms:description: Performance metrics of the LSTM model across different sectors, derived from the results of the study.
dcterms:title: Performance metrics of the LSTM model across different sectors
